data.title: Kenneth L. Bennett Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Obituaries and announcements from Kenneth L. Bennett Funeral Home, as published in The Daily Star
data.text:
Joyce W. Worden Obituary

Franklin

Joyce W. Worden, 92, of Franklin, passed away on Tuesday, July 23, 2024, at Bassett Medical Center, Cooperstown.

She is survived by her children, Thomas (Linda) Worden, Scott (Tina) Worden, Christopher (Katrina) Worden, and Susan (Matt) Campbell; 10 grandchildren, Justin, Jon, and Lindsay Worden, Travis Sohns, Miranda Katalinas, Christina and Megan Worden,...

John G. Cronk Obituary

Oneonta

ONEONTA - A memorial service and celebration of life for John G. Cronk, who passed on April 12, 2024, will be held Saturday, June 22. The 11 a.m. memorial service will be at St. Paul's Episcopal Church, 307 Main St. Franklin. Immediately following the service, a celebration of life and luncheon will take place at Open Doors United Methodist Church, 475 Main...

John George Cronk Death Notice

Oneonta

John George Cronk passed at home on April 12, 2024.

A memorial service and celebration of his life will be held on June 22.

Arrangements are by Kenneth L. Bennett Funeral Home.

Share condolences online at www.bennettfh.com.

Rollamarie Whitbeck Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Rollamarie Whitbeck, Franklin, passed away at Cooperstown Center on Thursday, May 18, 2023, at the age of 95.

She was born in Merrickville on May 2, 1928, to Lewis and Ruthann Wormuth.

She attended Franklin Central School and married her high school sweetheart, Clifford Whitbeck, on June 18,1945.

Rollamarie was a homemaker, bookkeeper, skilled...

James B. Cleaveland Funeral Service

Franklin

FRANKLIN - graveside committal services, with military honors, for James B. Cleaveland, 80, of Franklin, who passed away on Jan. 14, will take place at 11 a.m., Friday June 2, in Ouleout Valley Cemetery, Franklin.

Vivian S. Groat Funeral Service

Franklin

A graveside committal service for Vivian S. Groat, 97, of Franklin, who died Feb. 21, 2023, will take place at 11 a.m., Friday, May 19, in Ouleout Valley Cemetery, Franklin.

Helen D. Collison Obituary

Oneonta

ONEONTA - Helen D. Collison, 89, of Oneonta, formerly of Franklin, passed away on Wednesday, May 3, 2023.

She was born on Dec. 18, 1933, in Franklin, the daughter of Arthur W. and Eva M. (Jackson) Dumond.

She married William "Bill" Collison on Jan. 2, 1954. He predeceased her on Jan. 30, 2018.

A lifelong area resident, Helen was employed by Franklin Central...

Joan (Bennett) Lohrman Obituary

Margaretville

MARGARETVILLE - Joan (Bennett) Lohrman, 91, formerly of Franklin, passed away suddenly on April 18, 2023, at Westchester Medical Center, surrounded by her loving family.

She was predeceased by her loving husband of 65 years, Richard F. Lohrman; and sister-in-law, Sharon Bennett.

Joan is survived by her two adoring daughters, Nancy Seiden of Kingston,...

Walter Arthur Cronauer Obituary

Delhi

DELHI - Walter Arthur Cronauer passed away on March 9, 2023, at Delhi Rehabilitation and Nursing Center in Delhi, following a long and courageous battle with myeloma cancer.

He was born Oct. 15, 1930, on the family farm in Franklin, to Alexander H. Cronauer and Martha (Boning) Cronauer.

Walter graduated from Franklin Central School in 1949. He was an honor...

Vivian S. Groat Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Vivian S. Groat, 97, of Franklin, died on Tuesday, Feb. 21, 2023, at UHS Delaware Valley Hospital in Walton.

She was born on Nov. 29, 1925, in Westford, the daughter of Edward J. and Silva (Perry) Skellie.

In 1944, she married Norman W. Groat, in Westford. He predeceased her in 1981.

Vivian was employed for 35 years as a chief clerk for the U.S....

James B. Cleaveland Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - James B. Cleaveland, 80, of Franklin, passed away on Jan. 14, 2023.

James was born July 30, 1942, in Greene, the son of Chester and Mary (Seath) Cleaveland.

He graduated from Franklin Central School in 1961.

He married Rosemarie Puhm in Gardena, California, on Sept. 24, 1966.

James worked at Boeing Aircraft in Renton, Washington, as a model maker in...

Carolyn J. Thies Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Carolyn J. Thies of Franklin, passed away peacefully with her family by her side on Nov. 28, 2022.

She was born April 28, 1947, to the late Harry and Helen Greiner. She joins her husband of 55 years, Leslie G. Thies, in Heaven.

She leaves behind a brother, Harry "JR" and Debbie Greiner; sons, Mark A. Thies (Janet Long), Matthew A. Thies (Crystal...

Janet L. Harmon Obituary

Unadilla

UNADILLA - Janet L. Harmon of Unadilla, formerly of Franklin, passed away Dec. 14, 2022, following a long illness, with her sister at her side.

She was born Dec. 18, 1957, in Sidney, the daughter of John and Marjorie (Woodard) Harmon.

Janet was a 1976 graduate of Franklin Central School. She was known as an outstanding athlete and was a member of the varsity...

Patricia Anne Driggs Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Patricia Anne Driggs, 64, of Franklin, passed away on her birthday, Friday, Nov. 4, 2022, at home, surrounded by family.

She was born on Nov. 4, 1958, in Oneonta, the daughter of Charles and Marion (Banks) Grant. She married Frederick Driggs on Jan. 8, 1984, in Oneonta. He predeceased her on May 24, 2014.

Patricia was employed as a sales manager...

Rodney Merton Hebbard Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Rodney Merton Hebbard, 82, of Franklin, passed away with family at his side, in the home he built with his own hands, on Oct. 28, 2022.

Rodney was born March 8, 1940, to June and Merton Hebbard in East Worcester, the oldest of four brothers.

Growing up in rural New York, Rodney worked on dairy farms and building homes alongside his father where he...

Emerson Shivers Jr. Obituary

Oneonta

ONEONTA - Emerson Shivers Jr., 65, of Oneonta, passed away on Sunday, Sept. 25, 2022, at Chestnut Park Nursing & Rehabilitation in Oneonta of cancer diagnosed in August.

Emerson was born April 19, 1957, in Mt. Holly, New Jersey, the son of Irene (Shover) Shivers and the late Emerson Sr.

He lived on the farm in New York from 1960 to 1967 until his family...

Emerson Shivers Jr. Death Notice

Oneonta

ONEONTA - Emerson Shivers Jr., 65, of Oneonta, passed away Sunday, Sept. 25, 2022.

A complete obituary will follow in The Daily Star.

Arrangements are by the Kenneth L. Bennett Funeral Home, Franklin.

Wilfred T. Jurjens Funeral Service

Meredith

Friends and relatives of Wilfred Jurjens are invited to a Celebration of Life on June 25th at 11:30, at Meredith Baptist Church, to share hugs and tears, and stories and laughter.

Tracy Scott Tarbell Obituary

Afton

AFTON - Tracy Scott Tarbell, 56, passed away unexpectedly Monday, March 28, 2022, at Chenango Memorial Hospital, Norwich.

He was born Oct. 26, 1965, in Sidney the son of the late Floyd and Arlene (Moore) Tarbell.

Tracy graduated from Franklin Central School with the Class of 1983. He attended SUNY Delhi studying accounting.

On Aug. 11, 2012, Tracy married...

Katharine Morgan Obituary

Franklin

FRANKLIN - Katharine Morgan died peacefully on Feb. 18, 2022, at her home in Franklin.

Katharine was a beloved daughter of George and Lorinda Morgan of Walton; a loving mother to Henry Medina; a cherished sister to Lois (Daniel) Cook, Anne (Nick) Kelsh, George (Mary) Morgan, and Rebecca Morgan (Gregory Schnabel); and a devoted aunt to her nine nieces and...

Wilfred T. Jurjens Obituary

Meredith

MEREDITH - Wilfred Thomas Jurjens, died Feb. 12, 2022, at the age of 91.

He was born June 18, 1930, the son of the late Mello and Anita (Haynes) Jurjens. He lived his entire life on the family farm on Route 28 in Meredith.

In addition to his parents, he was predeceased by brothers, Mello Jr. and wife, Elva (Dibble), Lester and wife, Mae (Townsend); sister,...
